grith.jgrith.myProxy
Class MyProxy_light

java.lang.Object
  grith.jgrith.myProxy.MyProxy_light

public class MyProxy_light
extends Object

This class is really only to show how to upload/retrieve a MyProxy credential. Just copy & paste the lines you need into your code.

Author:
markus

Method Detail

getDelegation

public static GSSCredential getDelegation(String myproxyServer,
                                          int myproxyPort,
                                          GSSCredential credential,
                                          String username,
                                          char[] passphrase,
                                          int lifetime_in_seconds)
                                   throws org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException
Retrieves a GSSCredential from a myproxy server using username & password. This method is used if you want to retrieve a proxy that requires authentication.

Parameters:
myproxyServer - the hostname of the myproxy server
myproxyPort - the port of the myproxy server (default is 443)
credential - the credential that is used to authenticate against the MyProxy server
username - the username the user used when uploading the proxy
passphrase - the passphrase the user used when uploading the proxy
lifetime_in_seconds - how long you want the proxy to be valid
Returns:
the delegated credential
Throws:
org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException - if something did not work

getDelegation

public static GSSCredential getDelegation(String myproxyServer,
                                          int myproxyPort,
                                          String username,
                                          char[] passphrase,
                                          int lifetime_in_secs)
                                   throws org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException
Retrieves a GSSCredential from a myproxy server using username & password. This method is used when you want to retrieve a proxy that has got the "allow anonymous retriever) flag enabled.

Parameters:
myproxyServer - the hostname of the myproxy server
myproxyPort - the port of the myproxy server (default is 443)
username - the username the user used when uploading the proxy
passphrase - the passphrase the user used when uploading the proxy
lifetime_in_secs - how long you want the proxy to be valid
Returns:
the delegated credential
Throws:
org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException - if something did not work

getMyProxy

public static org.globus.myproxy.MyProxy getMyProxy(String myproxyserver,
                                                    int myproxyPort)

init

public static void init(org.globus.myproxy.MyProxy myproxy,
                        org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential credential,
                        org.globus.myproxy.InitParams proxy_parameters,
                        char[] myProxyPassphrase)
                 throws GSSException,
                        org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException
Delegates (uploads) a GSSCredential to the myproxy server with the specified proxy_paramters. Use the prepareProxyParameters() method to actually prepare them.

Parameters:
myproxy - the myproxy server to upload the credential to (create with new MyProxy("server", port) - port is usually 7512)
credential - the credential you want to delegate to the server (this uses a GlobusCredential) instead of a GSSCredential
proxy_parameters - the parameters for the credential on the myproxy server. See the prepareProxyParameters() method.
myProxyPassphrase - the passphrase for the credentials on the myproxy server.
Throws:
GSSException - if the credential can't be used (or destroyed after the upload)
org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException - if the delegation process fails

init

public static void init(org.globus.myproxy.MyProxy myproxy,
                        GSSCredential credential,
                        org.globus.myproxy.InitParams proxy_parameters,
                        char[] myProxyPassphrase)
                 throws GSSException,
                        org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException
Delegates (uploads) a GSSCredential to the myproxy server with the specified proxy_paramters. Use the prepareProxyParameters() method to actually prepare them.

Parameters:
myproxy - the myproxy server to upload the credential to (create with new MyProxy("server", port) - port is usually 7512)
credential - the credential you want to delegate to the server
proxy_parameters - the parameters for the credential on the myproxy server. See the prepareProxyParameters() method.
myProxyPassphrase - the passphrase for the credentials on the myproxy server.
Throws:
GSSException - if the credential can't be used (or destroyed after the upload)
org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException - if the delegation process fails

prepareProxyParameters

public static org.globus.myproxy.InitParams prepareProxyParameters(String username,
                                                                   String proxyname,
                                                                   String renewer,
                                                                   String retriever,
                                                                   String description,
                                                                   int lifetime_in_seconds)
                                                            throws org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException
Prepares the common parameters for a myproxy put operation. Paramaters marked as optional can be null.

Parameters:
username - the username for the proxy on the myproxy server
proxyname - the credential name (so someone can have multiple proxies under one username) for the proxy. (Optional)
renewer - who is allowed to renew the delegated credential (* for anonymous renewal - this is also used if null)
retriever - who is allowed to retrieve a delegated credential (* for anonymous retrieval - this is also used if null)
description - a description for the credential. (Optional)
lifetime_in_seconds - the lifetime of a delegated credential. (if smaller 0 the hardcoded default lifetime of 12 h will be used)
Returns:
the parameters wrapped in one object
Throws:
org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException - if a required field is missing
